description: This file implements a simple service locator pattern to provide access to repository instances in an Android application, avoiding dependency injection frameworks and managing database instance access centrally.

classes.name: ServiceLocator
classes.description: A singleton object providing static methods to access various repositories without using a dependency injection framework.

methods.name: levelProgressRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of LevelProgressRepository using the provided context.

methods.name: achievementRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of AchievementRepository using the provided context.

methods.name: rewardRepository
methods.description: Provides an instance of RewardRepository using the provided context.
